sections.name: TWITTER CONFIGURATIONS
sections.label: Twitter Configurations
sections.description: mandatory otherwise the connector won't work

props.name: twConsumerKey
props.label: twConsumerKey
props.description: Twitter consumer key

props.name: twConsumerSecret
props.label: twConsumerSecret
props.description: Twitter consumer secret

props.name: twToken
props.label: twToken
props.description: Twitter token

props.name: twTokenSecret
props.label: twTokenSecret
props.description: Twitter token secret

sections.name: NODE  CONFIGURATIONS
sections.label: Node Configurations
sections.description: Configurations related to the master node that hosts the application

props.name: nodeName
props.label: Node Name
props.description: Name of the node that hosts the application

props.name: proxyHost
props.label: Proxy Host
props.description: valorize if a proxy is used for outbound connections

props.name: proxyPort
props.label: Proxy Port
props.description: valorize if a proxy is used for outbound connections

props.name: numMaxCore
props.label: num Max Core
props.description: max number of cores that can be used for this application

props.name: sparkBatchDurationMillis
props.label: sparkBatchDurationMillis
props.description: duration of a spark batch (consider that objects will be sent on the bus for each batch)

props.name: twitterInserterWindowDuration
props.label: twitterInserterWindowDuration
props.description: time window on which data will be saved

props.name: serverPort
props.label: server listening Port
props.description: Jetty server port

props.name: savePartitions
props.label: savePartitions
props.description: the number of partitions to coalesce before save

props.name: dataOutputFolder
props.label: dataOutputFolder
props.description: the folder where data has to be saved

props.name: dataRootFolder
props.label: dataRootFolder
props.description: Example dataOutputFolder=file://tmp/data and dataRootFolder=raw will save data on file://tmp/data/raw/...

props.name: daoClass
props.label: daoClass
props.description: class for the custom dao if you don't want to use the default one

props.name: brokersList
props.label: brokersList
props.description: Kafka brokers list

props.name: kafkaRequiredAcks
props.label: kafkaRequiredAcks
props.description: tells Kafka that you want your Producer to require an acknowledgement from the Broker that the message was received.

props.name: maxTotalConnections
props.label: maxTotalConnections
props.description: number of connections for the connection pool

props.name: maxIdleConnections
props.label: maxIdleConnections
props.description: number of connections for the connection pool

props.name: customProducerFactoryImpl
props.label: customProducerFactoryImpl
props.description: valorize if needed other implementation for connection to bus different than kafka

props.name: log4j.logger.com.tilab.ca
props.label: log4j.logger.com.tilab.ca
props.description: INFO, stdout

sections.name: COMMON CONFIGURATIONS
sections.label: Common Configurations
sections.description: common configurations between stream and batch version of GRA

props.name: roundPos
props.label: roundPos
props.description: Number of decimals on which you want to round geolocation latitude and longitude doubles

props.name: daoImplClass
props.label: daoImplClass
props.description: Dao implementation class (available also com.tilab.ca.sda.gra_consumer_dao.GraConsumerDaoHibImpl)

props.name: coloursModelImplClass
props.label: coloursModelImplClass
props.description: implementation of colours machine learning Model (Naive Bayes,Decision Tree...)

props.name: descrModelImplClass
props.label: descrModelImplClass
props.description: implementation of user description machine learning Model (Naive Bayes,Decision Tree...)

props.name: namesGenderMapImplClass
props.label: namesGenderMapImplClass
props.description: implementation of user gender map

props.name: featureExtractionClassImpl
props.label: featureExtractionClassImpl
props.description: feature extraction implementation class

props.name: trainingFilesPath
props.label: trainingFilesPath
props.description: training files path. Put training files on a shared fs  (hdfs,s3,nfs..)

props.name: colorAlgoReductionNumBits
props.label: colorAlgoReductionNumBits
props.description: number of bits for colour reduction algorithm

props.name: colorAlgoNumColorsToConsider
props.label: colorAlgoNumColorsToConsider
props.description: Number of colours to consider for gender classification through profile colours

sections.name: STREAM CONFIGURATIONS
sections.label: Stream Configurations
sections.description: Configurations for stream version of GRA

props.name: keyGeo
props.label: keyGeo
props.description: identificative topic on the internal bus for geolocalized tweets

props.name: keyHt
props.label: keyHt
props.description: identificative topic on the internal bus for tweets containing hashtags

props.name: keyRaw
props.label: keyRaw
props.description: identificative topic on the internal bus for raw tweets (not processed)

props.name: defaultRoundMode
props.label: defaultRoundMode
props.description: default round mode for grouping tweets

props.name: granMin
props.label: granMin
props.description: granularity in minutes (e.g. granMin=5 counts tweets in a time slot of 5 min)

props.name: numMaxCore
props.label: numMaxCore
props.description: max number of cores that can be used for this application

props.name: checkpointDir
props.label: checkpointDir
props.description: directory where the application will store checkpoints

props.name: sparkBatchDurationMillis
props.label: sparkBatchDurationMillis
props.description: duration of a spark batch (consider that objects will be sent on the bus for each batch)

props.name: graWindowDurationMillis
props.label: graWindowDurationMillis
props.description: time window on which data will be saved

props.name: busConnImplClass
props.label: busConnImplClass
props.description: bus connector implementation class

name: tw-tot-stream
label: Tw tot counter
description: Count the number of tweet, retweet and replies for a target hashTag or geo location
